org.araneaframework.backend.list.memorybased
Interface ExpressionBuilder

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
FieldFilter, ListFilter
All Known Implementing Classes:
AndFilter, BaseFieldFilter, BaseFilter, BaseRangeFilter, BaseRangeInRangeFilter, Constant, EndsWithFilter, EqualFilter, Field, GreaterThanFilter, InFilter, LikeFilter, LowerThanFilter, MultiFilter, NotFilter, NullFilter, OrFilter, RangeFilter, RangeInRangeFilter, SqlFunctionFilter, SqlFunctionFilter.Equal, SqlFunctionFilter.GreaterThan, SqlFunctionFilter.GreaterThanOrEquals, SqlFunctionFilter.LowerThan, SqlFunctionFilter.LowerThanOrEquals, StartsWithFilter, Value
public interface ExpressionBuilder
extends Serializable

General interface for objects that can create an expression.

Transforms a Map into an Expression.

Author:
Rein Raudjärv
See Also:
Expression, ExpressionFactory

Method Summary
 Expression buildExpression(Map data)
          Builds Expression.
 

Method Detail

buildExpression

Expression buildExpression(Map data)
Builds Expression.

Parameters:
data - object that can be used to configure building the expressions.
Returns:
Expression that is built according to the data or null if no expression has been built.
